DOC.brief_summary: The objective clinical study ass safety effectiveness Cordis Endovascular Quantum LP™ Stent Graft System .
DOC.brief_title: Study Endovascular QUANTUM LP™ Stent Graft System Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms ( AAA )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( Surgical Patients ) : 1 . Nonemergent surgical candidate ( aneurysm rupture ) 2 . Patients 21 year age old 3 . Male infertile Female 4 . Aneurysm > /=4.5 cm diameter , 5 . Aneurysm > /= twice normal aortic diameter directly aneurysm , 6 . Aneurysm > /= 4.0 cm diameter rapidly grow ( 0.5 cm 6 month ) , 7 . Saccular aneurysm > 3.0 cm Inclusion Criteria ( Stent Graft Patients ) 1 . Patient meet inclusion criterion surgical candidate 2 . Aneurysm start > /= 10 mm distal main renal artery diameter aorta within aortic neck segment variable 3 . Diameter aortic fixation zone ( neck ) > /= 22mm < /= 30 mm 4 . Supra renal aortic diameter < /= 34 mm 5 . The required device coverage length > /= 13 cm extend distal main renal artery ostium distal anchor site within common iliac artery ( external iliac artery plan occlusion internal iliac artery ) 6 . Aortic neck angulation < 60° estimate CT scan image angiogram 7 . Iliac artery attachment zone diameter < /= 20 mm 8 . Iliac arteries length > /= 10 mm nonaneurysmal vessel locate iliac graft attachment sit 9 . Iliac artery adequate peripheral access accommodate 22 Fr catheter delivery system 10 . Aortic bifurcation > 18 mm diameter 11 . Creatinine level < 2.5 mg/dl Exclusion Criteria ( Surgical Stent Graft Patients ) : 1 . Weight > 350 lb . ( 159 Kg ) 2 . Mycotic , rupture traumatic aneurysm 3 . Life expectancy < 2 year 4 . MI , cerebral vascular accident transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) within 6 month 5 . Expected occlusion need reimplantation significant mesenteric renal artery originate AAA Exclusion Criteria ( Stent Graft Patients ) 1 . Aneurysm symptomatic tender 2 . Creatinine > 2.5 mg/dl patient dialysis 3 . Thrombus proximal distal attachment area cover great 50 % endoluminal surface
